summary: Adds Gandalf The Grey as a Companion
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1300.photobucket.com/albums/ag88/scottaiel/gandalfportada_zps9c59199f.jpg[/IMG]


This mod Adds Gandalf the legendary mage from LOTR to Skyrim
You\'ll find him at Riverwood
He is Voiced (default voice, Ian voice not yet available :P)
Have fun travelling with this master companion , you wont regreat it.
He is able to Disarm opponents with his magical shout ^^

---- SHARE YOUR PICS WITH US !!!! :) 


He uses a sword and his own staff, he is powerfull, of course, but tried to balance him as much as I could :)

WHAT DO YOU NEED 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4198]Gandalf Hat[/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27790]Gandalf Staff[/url] 

*I want to give Big Credit to Quechus9 for his amazing Gandalf Staff design
*I want to give Big credit to DigitalLion for his amazing Gandalf Hat too
* I have modified the Gandalf Staff properties, so now the staff is able to shout a powerfull frost wall

Endorse if you like it :) !!!

Issues : 

JUST ONE ; May appear undressed before recruiting, thats why you\'ll need this: 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url] 
I RECOMMEND IT IF YOU DONT ALREADY USE IT!!!!!

And remember , FLY/RUN YOU FOOLS!!!!!

Check out the other amazing LOTR mods out there, they should be compatible, and could make a great immersive experience all together:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28522]The Uruk Hai Wars[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18338]LOTR Nazgul Wandering Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24428]Sarumans Tower[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15849]The Hobbit Hole[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23052]Herugrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19267]The Houses of Healing LOTR[/url]
author: Scottaiel
